content.raw:
it could be. Which cmake files are missing for you Nate? The package contains

    (bionic)jrivero@nium ~ $ sudo dpkg -L libogre-2.1-dev | grep cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/FindOGRE.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/FindOIS.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/FindPkgMacros.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/FindRapidjson.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/FindRemotery.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/FindSDL2.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/MacroLogFeature.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/OgreAddTargets.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/OgreConfigTargets.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/OgreFindFrameworks.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/OgreGetVersion.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/PrecompiledHeader.cmake
    /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/PreprocessorUtils.cmake

‌

it could be. Which cmake files are missing for you Nate? The package contains

(bionic)jrivero@nium ~ $ sudo dpkg -L libogre-2.1-dev | grep cmake
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/FindOGRE.cmake
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/FindOIS.cmake

/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/FindSDL2.cmake
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/MacroLogFeature.cmake
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/OgreAddTargets.cmake
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/OgreConfigTargets.cmake
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-2.1/cmake/OgreFindFrameworks.cmake
